article_title: Paul Fanlund: Ronald Reagan, Abraham Lincoln and the politics of 2015
article_text:
Madison, WI (53711)

Today

Scattered thunderstorms in the morning. Partly cloudy skies late. High around 85F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%..

Tonight

Partly cloudy with late night showers or thunderstorms. Low 64F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , barack obama, ronald reagan, scott walker, david axelrod, abraham lincoln, paul fanlund
article_metadata.author: Paul Fanlund | The Capital Times

og.description: Two books — viewed through the prism of current events — crystallize the stunning contrast between Scott Walker and Barack Obama.
